data.comment: The match has started at Studenternas IP.
Sirius drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Daniel Jarl for Sirius who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Kalmar are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick Kalmar.
Johan Karlsson is replacing Daniel Jarl for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Tim Bjorkstrom (Sirius) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Filip Sachpekidis (Kalmar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Kalmar a goal kick.
In the minute 10, In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar.
Elias Andersson (Sirius) has received a yellow card from Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 12, Goal kick for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Sirius.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 16, Kalmar needs to be cautious. Sirius have an attacking throw-in.
Axel Bjornstrom puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kalmar's half?
In the minute 19, Kalmar drives forward and Romarinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sirius are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 21, Nahom Girmai is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Kalmar are coming forward and Romarinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sirius have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Kalmar close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
The home team replace Nahom Girmai with Jamie Roche.
In the minute 25, Sirius to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Free kick Sirius.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 28, In Uppsala, Sirius push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius.
Elias Andersson (Sirius) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Goal! Sirius extend their lead to 2-0 through Mohammed Saeid.
Stefano Vecchia with an assist there.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius.
In the minute 34, Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Sirius.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
In the minute 38, Kalmar have a goal kick.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Kalmar's area.
In the minute 40, In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Romarinho is booked for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Uppsala.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Kalmar.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Sirius in the half of Kalmar.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Kalmar a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Studenternas IP.
Piotr Johansson pulls one back for Kalmar from the penalty spot.
Lukas Jonsson (Sirius) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Kalmar's Romarinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Throw-in for Sirius in the half of Kalmar.
Free kick in a good position for Sirius!
In the minute 51, Sirius are on the attack at Studenternas IP, where Stefano Vecchia is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Sirius are caught offside.
Throw-in Kalmar.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Sirius throw-in in Kalmar's half.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Geir Herrem (Kalmar) levels the match at 2-2 with a header.
Filip Sachpekidis instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 59, Stefano Vecchia (Sirius) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Stefano Vecchia (Sirius) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Kalmar at Studenternas IP.
In the minute 60, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sirius drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Uppsala.
In the minute 61, In Uppsala a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Kalmar.
Douglas Bergqvist for Kalmar gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 62, Sirius have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Sirius at Studenternas IP.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
In the minute 64, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
At Studenternas IP, Kalmar are penalized for being offside.
Kalmar make their first substitution with Isak Jansson replacing Filip Sachpekidis.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Kalmar in Uppsala.
In the minute 70, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 72, Kalmar have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Kalmar pushes forward through Isak Jansson, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 77, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Sirius.
Can Kalmar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sirius's half?
Nanne Bergstrand is making the team's second substitution at Studenternas IP with Rafinha replacing Carl Gustafsson.
York Raphael is on a sub for Geir Herrem for Kalmar.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Sirius.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Henrik Rydstrom (Sirius) is making a third substitution, with Laorent Shabani replacing Elias Andersson.
In the minute 82, Sirius's Yukiya Sugita breaks free at Studenternas IP. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Kalmar's Rafinha has been booked in Uppsala.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Kalmar.
In the minute 86, Romarinho (Kalmar) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Isak Magnusson is replacing Adrian Edqvist for the away team.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 88, Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kalmar's half?
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Sirius throw-in in Kalmar's half.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
Sirius have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Kalmar.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Sirius.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a throw-in for Kalmar, close to Sirius's area.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's full-time at Studenternas IP. The final score is 2-2.
